timeline.content:
Hello Marie, thank you for contacting Amber Student for your accommodation search in Bristol! As the official partner of University College London, we’re here to ensure you find the perfect place to stay.

I’m Shikha, and I’ll be guiding you through the process. Please let me know a convenient time to connect so we can move forward with discussing and exploring your preferred accommodation options.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Thankyou

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hello.
Speaker B: Hello, you must speak with Mario. Sorry, is this Mario speaking?
Speaker A: Yeah. Marie Tress.
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah, hi. This is from Amber. Student. How are you?
Speaker A: I'm fine, thank you. How are you?
Speaker B: I'm also doing great. Thank you so much for asking. This is regarding your accommodation. You are searching. Yeah. So I can see that you have recently filled this booking form for this IQ arcade.
Speaker A: Yeah.
Speaker B: 43 weeks, 277 pounds per week.
Speaker A: Yes. All right, 277, right?
Speaker B: Yes, that's correct.
Speaker A: Yeah.
Speaker B: I'm just proceeding ahead with the booking process. So I can see that you haven't mentioned your guarantor details, so I would require.
Speaker A: Because. Yeah, yeah, I know. Because, like, when I was doing that, my guarantor just had a call. Right now he's in a call and I don't know his email. That's my dad, by the way. I don't know his email. So I'm just waiting for him to. To finish a call so I can. Give me, like, 10 minutes.
Speaker B: Okay, sure. I have just dropped your WhatsApp text. You can just please let me know his email and the full name so that I can initiate the booking process for you at the earliest.
Speaker A: Okay, okay. Like, give me 10 minutes and I'll. Because I don't know what email he wants to use.
Speaker B: Okay, okay, sure.
Speaker A: And he's like, in a very important call, like, give me 10 minutes.
Speaker B: All right, sure.
Speaker A: Okay. Thank you so much. Most welcome.
